question: Which of the following is correct about Potassium sodium tartrate tetrahydrate?
option1: It is also known as Globular's salt
option2: It is known to exhibit piezoelectricity
answer: It is known to exhibit piezoelectricity
explanation: Potassium sodium tartrate tetrahydrate is commonly called as Rochelle salt. It was one of the first materials discovered to exhibit piezoelectricity.
